messages.subject: Samurai Archives Updates Newsletter
messages.msgSnippet: From now on, I ll be posting updates to the Samurai Archives here: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/samarchupdates/ so anyone who wants to keep abreast of the
messages.messageBody:
From now on, I'll be posting updates to the Samurai Archives here:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/samarchupdates/

so anyone who wants to keep abreast of the updates, feel free to join
up. The group is brand new, so there isn't much to look at yet, but
feel free to join the group.
